description: this requirement is for dnd digital transformation office dto. this requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under e60zt-18tsp who qualified under tier 1 for the following stream(s): a stream: business consulting change management stream b category: 2.4 organizational development consultant c level of expertise: senior the following sa holders have been invited to submit a proposal the proposed period of contract shall be from 1 june 2023 to one year after the estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 200 days provision applies to organizations with level of security of reliability or higher
